reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.text: We regularly lunch at Prince Hall with friends but decided to stay at night and sample dinner and breakfast.

The emphasis on this hotel is relaxation. There is nothing better than sitting by the roaring fire, with a cup of tea (or something stronger) and watching the ever changing dartmoor weather before walking the few steps to the restaurant.
reviews.title: Fantastic Meal, the best in Devon…….

reviews.text: The food is fantastic, fresh, well cooked, and the local produce meaning you are getting great quality.
reviews.title: Best dining experience on Dartmoor !

reviews.text: After dinner retire to the spacious, clean and well equipped bedrooms. We had a four poster with a view over the courtyard. It was lovely and quiet and we slept well.
reviews.title: Best cream tea on the planet!

reviews.text: Breakfast was just as good as dinner, cooked to order and with great local sausages and bacon.
reviews.title: Luxury but relaxed
